00077   {

00080     $minutes = floor(($totalSeconds % 60) / 60);
00081     $seconds = ($totalSeconds % 3600);
00082     return str_pad($hours, 2, '0', STR_PAD_LEFT).':'.str_pad($minutes, 2, '0', STR_PAD_LEFT).':'.str_pad($seconds, 2, '0', STR_PAD_LEFT);
